text: Gender euphoria (GE) is a proposed term for the opposite of gender dysphoria. It is the satisfaction, enjoyment, or relief felt by trans people when they feel their body matches their personal gender identity. Transgender congruence is also used for transgender individuals feeling genuine, authentic, and comfortable with their gender identity and appearance. GE experiences can occur in external, internal, and/or social settings and is considered a conglomeration of positive emotions and subjective well-being in response to being affirmed in one's gender. == Related pages == *Gender identity *Gender dysphoria *Non-binary == References == Category:Psychology Category:Gender
title: Gender euphoria
